2674.verse: Certainly will the believers have succeeded:

2675.verse: They who are during their prayer humbly submissive

2676.verse: And they who turn away from ill speech

2677.verse: And they who are observant of zakah

2678.verse: And they who guard their private parts

2679.verse: Except from their wives or those their right hands possess, for indeed, they will not be blamed -

2680.verse: But whoever seeks beyond that, then those are the transgressors -

2681.verse: And they who are to their trusts and their promises attentive

2682.verse: And they who carefully maintain their prayers -

2684.verse: Who will inherit al-Firdaus. They will abide therein eternally.

2685.verse: And certainly did We create man from an extract of clay.

2686.verse: Then We placed him as a sperm-drop in a firm lodging.

2687.verse: Then We made the sperm-drop into a clinging clot, and We made the clot into a lump [of flesh], and We made [from] the lump, bones, and We covered the bones with flesh; then We developed him into another creation. So blessed is Allah, the best of creators.

2688.verse: Then indeed, after that you are to die.

2689.verse: Then indeed you, on the Day of Resurrection, will be resurrected.

2690.verse: And We have created above you seven layered heavens, and never have We been of [Our] creation unaware.
